original: @287a # // rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: sha da aam ga yo ga na ma

analyzed: bod skad du

original: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sbyor ba yan lag drug ba zhes byed ba

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: jam ba rdo rje la phyag tshal lo

original: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: kun du bzang po zhes byed ba ni skyed rdzogs rnam ba gnyis te

original: de la thig le dang phra mo'i sbyor ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste gong ma ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de la thig le dang phra mo sbyor ba ni rdzogs ba rim ba ste gong ma ni skyed ba rim ba

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di gnyis rig pas grub pa'i yan lag drug pa'i go @287b rims kho nas bsgom ste /
analyzed: skyed ba dang rdzogs ba rim ba di gnyis rig ba grub ba yan lag drug ba go rims kho nas bsgom ste

original: gzhan du na yang dag pa'i grub pa mi 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa yang rgyud phyi ma las /
analyzed: gzhan du na yang dag ba grub ba mi thob bo zhes gsungs ba yang brgyud phyi ma las

original: bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni //
analyzed: snyen ba yan lag drug gis ni

original: grub pa mchog ni byas nas su //
analyzed: grub ba mchog ni byed nas su

original: bsgrub par bya yis gzhan du ni //
analyzed: sgrub ba byed yis gzhan du ni

original: dngos grub mchog tu 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog tu byung mi gyur

original: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang srog rtsol de bzhin dzin ba dang rjes su dran dang ting nge dzin

original: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu 'dod //
analyzed: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu dod

original: ces so // de la mig la sogs pa'i 'grel pa can rnam par shes pa lnga'o //
analyzed: ces so de la mig la sogs ba grel ba can rnam ba shes ba lnga

original: de rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la so sor sdud pa ni bkug nas yang dag par dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de so sor sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gzugs la sogs ba yul rnams la so sor sdud ba ni gugs nas yang dag ba dul ba byed ba gang yin ba de so sor sdud ba

original: yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud ba

original: bsam gtan ni so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa lag nyid du bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni so sor sdud ba go rims kyis yid kyi rnam ba shes ba lag nyid du bsgom ba

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam ba rtogs ba dang rnam ba dpyod ba dang dga ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig ba byed ba rnam ba lnga

original: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rjer brtags pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil khor dang cha ba joms ldan da jam ba rdo rjer rtog ba nyid ni rnam ba rtogs ba

original: de kho na la brten pa nyid kyis nges pa ni rnam par dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na la rten ba nyid kyis nges ba ni rnam ba dpyod ba

original: rnam par dpyod pas de rang de'i lha nyid du dmigs shing yid bde ba ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rnam ba dpyod ba de rang de lha nyid du dmigs shing yid bde ba ni dga ba

original: dga' ba bsgoms pas lha la sems zin pa ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga ba sgom ba lha la sems zin ba ni bde ba

original: bde ba dang ldan pa'i sems ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba'i phyir log pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa sna tshogs la dmigs pa'i mi shes pa 'byung ba zad pas 'dod pa'i lha kho na la dmigs pa'i sems ni rtse gcig pa nyid do zhes bya ba bsam gtan
analyzed: bde ba dang ldan ba sems ting nge dzin du gyur ba phyir log ba kun rdzob rnam ba sna tshogs la dmigs ba mi shes ba byung ba zad ba dod ba lha kho na la dmigs ba sems ni rtse gcig ba nyid do zhes byed ba bsam gtan

original: yan lag lnga po de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag lnga po de ni skyed ba rim ba

original: srog rtsol la sogs pas rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: srog rtsol la sogs ba rdzogs rim bsgom ba rim ba di yin te

original: me long lta bu mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: me long lta bu mnyam ba nyid

original: so sor rtog pa /
analyzed: so sor rtogs ba

original: bya ba grub pa /
analyzed: byed ba grub ba

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba lnga'i rgyu yin pas /
analyzed: shin tu rnam ba dag ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes byed ba lnga rgyu yin ba

original: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin me rlung sa chu nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin pas 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid srog rtsol thur du rgyu ba'i bya ba byas te /
analyzed: ye shes lnga rang bzhin me rlung sa chu nam mkha rang bzhin yin ba byung ba lnga bdag nyid srog rtsol thur du rgyu ba byed ba byed te

original: @288a * // yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam byang chub sems kyi thig le gong bu'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i sna rtser phab nas gong du gsungs pa'i so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan yan lag lnga'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: yungs bru tshad tsam byang chub sems kyi thig le gong bu tshul gyis rdo rje sna rtser bebs nas gong du gsungs ba so sor sdud ba dang bsam gtan yan lag lnga rim ba bsgom ba byed ste

analyzed: thig le sbyor ba di ni srog rlung phyi rol du rgyu ba zlog ba byed ba brgyud phyi ma las srog rtsol zhes rjod do

original: 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: di yang nye ba mtshon ba ste

original: snying ga'i thig le la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snying ga thig le la sogs ba sbyor ba yang yin ba shes ba byed

original: dbu mar srog rlung rgyu ba ni srog rtsol yin no //
analyzed: dbu mar srog rlung rgyu ba ni srog rtsol yin no

original: de nas snying gar mam yig kyang pa bsams te /
analyzed: de nas snying gar mam yig kyang ba bsams te

original: de'i thig le la srog rab tu 'jug par bsgoms pas gzung 'dzin srog rtsol dang bcas pa nyams pa'i phyir stong nyid dang ro gcig pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhi ba sems rin po che snang ba tsam nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od gsal nyid
analyzed: de thig le la srog rab tu jug ba sgom ba gzung dzin srog rtsol dang cha ba nyams ba phyir stong nyid dang ro gcig ba sangs rgya thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhi ba sems rin po che snang ba tsam nam mkha dang mtshungs ba d gsal nyid

analyzed: du gyur ba la gang srog rlung brtan ba gyur ba de ni dzin ba

original: 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: di yang nye ba mtshon ba tsam ste

analyzed: rdo rje sna rtse mor sgom ba phra mo sbyor ba

analyzed: sprin med ba nam mkha lta bu rtags lnga mthong ba gyur ro

analyzed: de nas srog rtsol dang cha ba sems d gsal ba rang bzhin gyis gang tshe sems brtan ba gyur ba de tshe

analyzed: smon lam gyi mthus sgom ba lha dran te

original: de la yang bsgoms pa'i lha phra ba'i sbyor ba las sgom pa pos 'od zer spro bar byed pa ni rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang sgom ba lha phra ba sbyor ba las sgom ba pos d zer spro ba byed ba ni rjes su dran ba

original: 'od de dang bcas pa'i ba spu'i bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rang bzhin spros pa ni rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba dgongs pa can yin no //
analyzed: d de dang cha ba ba spu bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs ba lha rang bzhin spros ba ni rjes su dran ba zhes byed ba dgongs ba can yin no

analyzed: dpal gsang ba du ba las

analyzed: rab mchog sprin rnams kyis spro byed

analyzed: sangs rgya ye shes mnyam d kyis

analyzed: skad cig gis rang rig ba ye shes byung ba ni ting nge dzin to

analyzed: brgyud gzhan nas ston ba dang brgyud ba rim ba las byung ba chad ba di kho na

analyzed: ye shes zhabs lugs kyi sbyor ba yan lag drug ba zhes byed ba rdzogs
